name: talentbd-monorepo

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Quick Deploy' && git push origin main
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && npm run install-all
scripts.audit-all: npm audit --prefix frontend && npm audit --prefix backend
scripts.logs: concurrently "npm run logs --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"

description: TalentBD 2026: The ultimate Ed-Tech & Fintech Hybrid Platform.
